highlight highlighting-in-code-fences 19package main 20 21import "fmt" 22 23func main() { 24	fmt.Println("Hello, 世界") 25} 26// ... code math katex $$ \begin{align} \sqrt{37} & = \sqrt{\frac{73^2-1}{12^2}} \\ & = \sqrt{\frac{73^2}{12^2}\cdot\frac{73^2-1}{73^2}} \\ & = \frac{73}{12}\sqrt{1 - \frac{1}{73^2}} \\ & \approx \frac{73}{12}\left(1 - \frac{1}{2\cdot73^2}\right) \end{align} $$
img all image lazy loaded
comment(footnote) Here’s a sentence with a footnote.1

Hello there, and have a nice day {{ < /box >}}
